title: marudamalai muruganai
sahitya:
marudamalai muruganai karudi vara maravEn manam karaindurugavE dinamtOrum nAn


anupallavi

  karuNakkOr kaDal pOl kATSi koDuppavan kazhalaDi tuNai tEDi tozhudadaip-pera nADi


caraNam    karuttilap-perumAn tirunAmam nilaittiDa niruttip-paravasham urum varai tudittu
varuttam Edum ini vandennai aNugAda varattaik-kOrippera karamEndi vaNangi
